attributes.action: Petition for Selaine Saxby MP to resign
attributes.additional_details: We want Selaine Saxby MP to resign as MP for North Devon over conflicting views with North Devon Residents and business owners. Her social media statements are unprofessional and her handling of the current situation display that she lacks the capacity to represent the majority of residents and business owners in North Devon.
attributes.background: We want the Government to call for Selaine Saxby MP to resign.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for MPs to be sacked or to resign.
